name: TOWER DEFENDER(Glitched)
description:
Weekly Game Jam 64 entry! The theme was 'GLITCH' for this week.

This is a game where you have to defend your tower. You can harvest resources and gain health, tower repairs and tower armor  etc, You have got your 'Hammer' to beat enemies as well as harvest resources.

The Glitch can be introduced in the game at any time. It will remap your key controls....

Can you keep up with that? Give it a try!

TIPS: 

  • Left Click + Drag to pan the camera!
  • Hold right click while harvesting to get a better view from tower and try panning from tower!
